chipsets.c: Accelerates the deployment of all viruses.
Viruses masking your attacks or movements (invisibility for example) cost less (resources).
All damage you inflict is increased, but the cost (resources) of these damaging viruses increases too.
You get many more resource points, but your armour takes damage periodically (unblockable).
You can accumulate up to 5 combo points (instead of 3).
You can partially read hidden filenames.
OXY anti-virus systems and their variants cause you less damage.
SCRAMBLER anti-virus systems no longer block your scanners and and your scanners can view the contents of password-protected folders.
Lets you explore a network before a mission. This exploration is highly limited (in particular, it is impossible to complete the mission objective) but the mission bonus is not reduced.
You can copy more files during a given mission (using the COPIER virus).
Your viruses which decipher or reveal hidden files cost less (resources).
